title: Ambassador-designate to Morocco calls on Caretaker PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 11 (APP): Pakistanâ€™s Ambassador-designate to Morocco Sami Malik on Wednesday called on Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar.
The prime minister felicitated the ambassador-designate on his new assignment and expressed his good wishes, PM Office Media Wing said in a press release.
The caretaker prime minister directed the ambassador of making efforts to further strengthen Pakistan-Morocco bilateral ties and taking of steps to increase bilateral cooperation between the two countries in diverse fields.
